scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run tauri build
scripts.build:frontend: cd ../kubilitics-frontend && TAURI_BUILD=true npm run build:tauri && rm -rf ../kubilitics-desktop/dist && cp -r dist ../kubilitics-desktop/dist
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "npm run dev:frontend" "sleep 3 && npm run tauri dev"
